abstracts.cdata!:
The Fourth Sui Northern Gas Pipelines
            Project in Pakistan was implemented. The Bank not only
            provided all required foreign exchange, but also provided
            support in selection and evaluation of the proper technical
            solutions, contract packaging and grouping procurement of
            services, and equipment, prequalification of contractors and
            various design matters. The Bank was instrumental in
            achieving the technical objectives of the project. The
            relationship with the borrower remains excellent. All power
            generating units which can be converted to fuel oil should
            be modified to operate on dual firing, using gas in summer
            and fuel oil in winter. In view of the constraints in future
            gas supply GOP should take concrete measures to limit growth
            in gas demand by curtailing future use of gas in thermal
            power generation and exercise peak load shaving during peak
            demand. The experience learned from the Fourth project
            provides assurance for positive results in continuing the
            dialogue with Government of Pakistan for the development of
            the energy sector to achieve their objectives.
